product_overview: An interactive web application designed to facilitate access to education materials, allowing users to navigate through education levels, select programs, and download course content with ease.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive landing and navigation experience for all education levels.
Allow users to select their education year and browse related programs (filieres) efficiently.
Support detailed navigation into modules for each program.
Enable users to access and download course materials seamlessly.
Ensure smooth, responsive application behavior with loading states, error handling, and pagination for large data sets.
Maintain robust API communication with structured service layers and error boundaries.
key_features: Welcome Page with navigation to education levels.
Education Level Selection without numeric icons for a clean UI.
Paginated listing of educational programs showing 5 items per page.
Modules listing per selected program allowing detailed exploration.
Direct download functionality for course materials including PDFs and documents.
Reusable loading spinner component to indicate data fetching.
Error message component with retry capability for failing requests.
React Error Boundary for catching UI runtime errors and graceful degradation.
Reusable pagination component to navigate large lists efficiently.
API client with Axios interceptors for enhanced communication and error handling.
Structured education service layer for RESTful API endpoints.
Comprehensive routing using React Router for smooth navigation throughout the app.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Welcome Page and selects their Education Level.
User views a paginated list of educational programs (filieres) for the selected year.
User selects a specific filiere to view its associated modules.
User navigates into a module to view and download available course materials.
Throughout the process, loading states and errors are gracefully handled and displayed.
Users can navigate back and forth using the routing system without losing state.
validation_criteria: Application correctly displays welcome and education level selection pages.
Pagination of filieres works correctly with 5 items per page and navigation controls.
Modules and course materials are displayed correctly for the selected filiere.
Course materials download links work and files can be downloaded without errors.
Loading spinner appears during data fetch operations.
Error messages display with retry options on request failures.
Error boundary catches unexpected errors and displays fallback UI.
Routing allows seamless navigation without page reloads or state loss.
API client handles request/response and errors as expected with interceptors.
